TutorialStart: ^Somebody is caught inside that room up there! I need something to get that rubble out of the way!
^I'm pretty sure I dropped my Pickaxe down in the cellar before I died. But it's been 400 years and I cant remember the location of the entrance...
DidHelp: ^Please go and find the hatch down into the basement. If you've got the pickaxe, go and bring it to me. I'll do the rest.
Helping: ^This damned hatch has to be somewhere around here! Keep looking!
PickaxePickedUp: ^You found it! That's great, give it here
^Whatever, you'll have to do it! Take it and Go!
BreakStones: ^Just swing it as hard as you can at that pile of stones in front of the door up there.
^You can do that by holding the Interact Button.
